00037 #define MAX_NR_SPE      CTK_SPE_THREAD_GROUP_MAX
00038 #define MAX_NR_SPE_TASKS_PER_RUNTIME    64
00039 
00040 typedef struct {
00041     ctk_queue_ea_t runq;
00042     volatile ctk_val64_t spe_task_bits;
00043     volatile ctk_val64_t spe_detached_task_bits;
00044     ea_addr_t spe_tasks_ea;
00045     ctk_spe_thread_group_t spe_group;
00046     char dummy[] __attribute__((aligned(128)));
00047 } ctk_spe_runtime_body_t;

00107 int ctk_spe_runtime_enq_task(ctk_spe_runtime_t runtime, ctk_spe_task_t task, void *arg1, void *arg2);
00108 
00115 int ctk_spe_runtime_wait_task(ctk_spe_runtime_t runtime, ctk_spe_task_t task);
00116 
00117 /* no-yield version */
00118 int ctk_spe_runtime_wait_task_spin(ctk_spe_runtime_t runtime, ctk_spe_task_t task);
00119 
00126 static inline int ctk_spe_runtime_invoke_task(ctk_spe_runtime_t runtime, ctk_spe_task_t task, void *arg1, void *arg2) __attribute__((always_inline));
00127 static inline int ctk_spe_runtime_invoke_task(ctk_spe_runtime_t runtime, ctk_spe_task_t task, void *arg1, void *arg2)
00128 {
00129     int ret = ctk_spe_runtime_enq_task(runtime, task, arg1, arg2);
00130     if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00131         return ret;
00132     return ctk_spe_runtime_wait_task_spin(runtime, task);
00133 }
